package.name: glibc
package.build: cd glibc-build case `uname -m` in i?86) echo "CFLAGS += -march=i686 -mtune=generic -O2 -pipe" > configparms ;; esac ../glibc-${PKGVERSION}/configure \ --prefix=/usr \ --enable-kernel=2.6.32 \ --enable-obsolete-rpc case `uname -m` in i?86) make -j 4 ;; *) make ;; esac make echo '=== Build finished, testing...' make -k check 2>&1 | tee glibc-check-log echo '=== Testing finished, grepping...' grep Error glibc-check-log
package.test: cd glibc-build make -k check 2>&1 | tee glibc-check-log grep Error glibc-check-log
package.install:
cd glibc-build touch /etc/ld.so.conf make install cp -v ../glibc-${PKGVERSION}/nscd/nscd.conf /etc/nscd.conf mkdir -pv /var/cache/nscd mkdir -pv /usr/include/rpc mkdir -pv /usr/include/rpcsvc # cp -v ../glibc-${PKGVERSION}/sunrpc/rpc/*.h /usr/include/rpc # cp -v ../glibc-${PKGVERSION}/sunrpc/rpcsvc/*.h /usr/include/rpcsvc # cp -v ../glibc-${PKGVERSION}/nis/rpcsvc/*.h /usr/include/rpcsvc mkdir -pv /usr/lib/locale make localedata/install-locales cat > /etc/nsswitch.conf << "EOF" # Begin /etc/nsswitch.conf
passwd: files group: files shadow: files
hosts: files dns networks: files
protocols: files services: files ethers: files rpc: files
# End /etc/nsswitch.conf EOF
cat > /etc/ld.so.conf << "EOF" # Begin /etc/ld.so.conf
/usr/local/lib /opt/lib /usr/compat.new/lib /usr/compat.old/lib
# End /etc/ld.so.conf EOF
